department: Public Works and Government Services Department (PWGSC)
description: The Canadian Border Service Agency (CBSA) wants to purchase office furniture for Moncton, New Brunswick. The delivery and installation deadline is by April 8, 2024. Suppliers must be pre-qualified vendors and have a supply arrangement to participate in the bidding process.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement:
#### Solicitation Number - WS4388687757
#### Notice Title:
#### Office Furniture, CBSA - Moncton, NB
#### Solicitation Status: Expired

931 words remaining...

This solicitation is a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of office furniture to the Canadian Border Services Agency (CBSA) in Moncton, New Brunswick. The project aims to purchase, deliver, and install furniture to the CBSA's office by April 8, 2024.

**Solicitation Details:**

- **Solicitation Number:** WS4388687757
- **Title (English):** Office Furniture, CBSA - Moncton, NB
- **Title (French):** Mobilier de bureau - Agence des services frontaliers du Canada (ASFC), Moncton (N.-B.)
- **Notice Date:** January 10, 2024
- **Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, at 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** January 30, 2024
- **Contract Start Date:** February 16, 2024
- **Contract End Date:** N/A

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18475095?extsite=MTg0NzUwOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

- **Name:** Kristelle Leblanc (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** N/A
- **Fax:** N/A
- **Address:** N/A

**Request for Proposal:**

The project is covered under Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C, and the products required are from Product Category 1, 2, 3, 5, and 6. This is a General Supply Arrangement (GSA) requirement, and only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid. However, non-supply arrangement (non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the identified user but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

For more information on the pre-qualification process, suppliers can contact [
